Desc.entry: Part of Legal Services, Sheffield City Council, offering detailed information and guidance for businesses which require licenses or permits including: Licensing Act 2003, Safety of Sports Grounds, Marriage Act, Pet Shops, Dog Breeders, Riding Establishments, Animal Boarding Establishments, Dangerous Wild Animals, Sex Establishments, Amusement Arcades, House to House Collections, Street Collections, Small Lotteries, Street Traders, Scrap Metal Dealers, Track Betting and Motor Salvage Operators, Gambling Act 2005.
